name: Erylium

specials.name: Abyssal Knowledge
specials.description: When a quasit offers Aid for an Arcana or Religion check, it gets the critical success result on any success and gets the critical failure result on any failure.

specials.name: Virtue Aversion
specials.description: The quasit’s link to a mortal soul gave it birth, but it presents a vulnerability. Once per round, a creature can present an object related to something virtuous or good in the life of the quasit’s creator (such as a beloved daughter’s doll) as an Interact action to automatically deal the quasit 2d6 mental damage.

specials.name: Abyssal Healing
specials.description: Frequency once per round; Effect The quasit restores 2d6+2 HP to itself.

specials.name: Change Shape
specials.description:
**Bat** echolocation 40 feet; Speed 15 feet, fly Speed 30 feet; Melee fangs +14, Damage 1d4–1 piercing; Melee wing +14(agile), Damage 1d4–1 bludgeoning
**Centipede** Speed 10 feet, climb 10 feet; Melee mandibles +14 (poison), Damage 1 piercing plus 1d4 poison
**Toad** scent (imprecise) 30 feet; Speed 5 feet; Melee jaws +14 Damage 1 bludgeoning
**Wolf** size Medium; scent (imprecise) 30 feet; Speed 40 feet, climb 10 feet; Melee jaws +14, Damage 2d6+3 piercing plus Knockdown

specials.name: Quasit Venom
specials.description: Saving Throw DC [dc] Fortitude; Maximum Duration 6 rounds; Stage 1 2d6 poison (1 round); Stage 2 As stage 1; Stage 3 2d6 poison and slowed 1 (1 round)

savenote: +1 status bonus to all saves vs. magic
spells: detect alignment (at will, good only), invisibility (at will, self only)

strikes.name: Claw
strikes.damage: 2d6+1 slashing plus 1d4 evil and Quasit Venom
